title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing is not displayed.
SR:
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.
2. Ensure the new data source has no database/table/column information.
3. Observe that the children node listing is not displayed when changing the data source for the data set.
4. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
